# Mysteries of Shadow (Level 16 Illusionist)
## Overview
*Each volume of this three-book set is written in gold ink on jet-black paper.* *[[Illusory Script (Spell)|Illusory script]]** hides descriptions of the geography and denizens of the Shadow Plane.*

**Protection** *[[Illusory Script (Spell)|illusory script]]* (Will DC 16; on failure the suggestion is “Forget the existence of the descriptions and notes”), *[[Phantom Trap (Spell)|phantom trap]]* (opening any of the books seems to set off a trap)

**Opposition Schools** divination, evocation

**Value** 11,820 gp (15,020 gp with the preparation ritual)

**Spells**

8th—*[[Shadow Evocation, Greater (Spell)|greater shadow evocation]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Mind Blank (Spell)|mind blank]]*, *[[Scintillating Pattern (Spell)|scintillating pattern]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Temporal Stasis (Spell)|temporal stasis]]*

7th—*[[Finger of Death (Spell)|finger of death]]*, *[[Shadow Conjuration, Greater (Spell)|greater shadow conjuration]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Project Image (Spell)|project image]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Simulacrum (Spell)|simulacrum]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Spell Turning|spell turning]]*

6th—*[[Eyebite (Spell)|eyebite]]*, *[[Guards and Wards (Spell)|guards and wards]]*, *[[Limited Wish (Spell)|limited wish]]*, *[[Permanent Image (Spell)|permanent image]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Programmed Image (Spell)|programmed image]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Shadow Walk (Spell)|shadow walk]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Symbol of Persuasion (Spell)|symbol of persuasion]]*

5th—*[[Cloudkill (Spell)|cloudkill]]*, *[[Mirage Arcana (Spell)|mirage arcana]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Mind Fog (Spell)|mind fog]]*, *[[Nightmare (Spell)|nightmare]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Seeming (Spell)|seeming]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Shadow Evocation (Spell)|shadow evocation]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Telekinesis|telekinesis]]*

4th—*[[Black Tentacles (Spell)|black tentacles]]*, *[[Dimension Door (Spell)|dimension door]]*, *[[Invisibility, Greater (Spell)|greater invisibility]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Globe of Invulnerability, Lesser (Spell)|lesser globe of invulnerability]]*, *[[Phantasmal Killer (Spell)|phantasmal killer]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Remove Curse (Spell)|remove curse]]*, *[[Scrying (Spell)|scrying]]* <sup>OP</sup>, *[[Shadow Conjuration (Spell)|shadow conjuration]]* <sup>S</sup>

3rd—*[[Dispel Magic (Spell)|dispel magic]]*, *[[Heroism (Spell)|heroism]]*, *[[Illusory Script (Spell)|illusory script]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Magic Circle Against Good (Spell)|magic circle against good]]*, *[[Major Image (Spell)|major image]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Phantom Steed (Spell)|phantom steed]]*, *[[Shrink Item (Spell)|shrink item]]*, *[[Slow (Spell)|slow]]*

2nd—*[[Arcane Lock (Spell)|arcane lock]]*, *[[Darkness (Spell)|darkness]]* <sup>OP</sup>, *[[False Life (Spell)|false life]]*, *[[Glitterdust (Spell)|glitterdust]]*, *[[Magic Mouth (Spell)|magic mouth]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Mirror Image (Spell)|mirror image]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Obscure Object (Spell)|obscure object]]*, *[[Phantom Trap (Spell)|phantom trap]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Whispering Wind (Spell)|whispering wind]]*

1st—*[[Color Spray (Spell)|color spray]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Disguise Self (Spell)|disguise self]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Endure Elements (Spell)|endure elements]]*, *[[Feather Fall (Spell)|feather fall]]*, *[[Grease (Spell)|grease]]*, *[[Magic Aura (Spell)|magic aura]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Minor Image (Spell)|minor image]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Obscuring Mist (Spell)|obscuring mist]]*, *[[Ray of Enfeeblement (Spell)|ray of enfeeblement]]*, *[[Silent Image (Spell)|silent image]]* <sup>S</sup>, *[[Ventriloquism (Spell)|ventriloquism]]* <sup>S</sup>

0—standard plus *[[Detect Magic (Spell)|detect magic]]* <sup>OP</sup>

**Preparation Ritual**

**Shadow Knowledge (Su)** The knowledge in this book clings to your consciousness like the Shadow Plane itself. Unlike other boons, you do not spend this one. Until you prepare spells again, you are considered trained in all [[Knowledge (Skill)|Knowledge]] skills as long as the check pertains to the geography and denizens of the Shadow Plane. If you are already trained in the appropriate [[Knowledge (Skill)|Knowledge]] skill, you gain a +2 circumstance bonus on these checks instead.

**Source:** Ultimate Magic, pg. 125
